titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of manufacturing equipment entered on or after May 11, 1997, and before October 21, 1998.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of manufacturing equipment entered on or after May 11, 1997, and before October 21, 1998.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of entries of certain manufacturing equipment.
